verses.roman:
'parameśvara kuśala hao, bhāla haila, āilā'
'mukundāra mātā āsiyāche, seha prabhure kahilā

synonyms: parameśvara—O Parameśvara; kuśala hao—be blessed; bhāla haila—it is very good; āilā—you have come; mukundāra mātā—the mother of Mukunda; āsiyāche—has come; seha—he; prabhure kahilā—informed the Lord.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu said, "Parameśvara, may you be blessed. It is very good that you have come here." Parameśvara then informed the Lord, "Mukundāra Mātā has also come."
